More Notes: Mean electricity that can be generated per square meter of solar panels during a day in the NEB.
Payoff time for PV investments considering 4% interest rates.
Gross annual revenues of PV energy generation alone correspond to 2.74 times the interest earned in the financial market at 6.5% interest.
Cost to calculate PV system costs.
PV electricity price contracted in Brazil's April 2018 Generation Auction A-4/2018.
Hydroelectricity and thermal biomass electricity price contracted in Brazil's April 2018 Generation Auction A-4/2018.
The annual revenue generated in this study is from a 1-hectare PV plant. It considers multiple factors including energy production and market value.
Annual maize production per hectare in the NEB.

PV generation approximately 500 times larger compared to the gross economic value resulting from the production of rain fed maize, a traditional subsistence culture in the region, per unit area. This comparison accounts for energy generation and maize production values.
Refers to income generation from fish production in an agrivoltaic system.
Economic yield of PV energy production is of the order of 500 times higher per unit area compared to cultivating maize, considering a year of regular rainfall.
